revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Parrot |model=AR.Drone |revision=v1.0 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless drone |fcc_id=RKXMYKONOS |ic_id= |pwr_v=11.1 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=JST-XH/mini-Tamiya |cpu1_brand=Parrot |cpu1_model=6 (CPICS01192A) |cpu1_cspeed=468 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08 |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT46H32M32LFCM-6 IT:A |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR6102G;AR6102G-BM2D; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=battery,diversity antenna,drone,2 cameras |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ardrone_xxxxxx |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:26:7E,90:03:B7 |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Parrot AR.Drone}}
Acts as an Access Point, controlled by iPhone app via WiFi. * {{WPLink|Parrot_AR.Drone}} * [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Parrot+AR.Drone+Teardown/3984 iFixit teardown] * [http://en.wikiversity.org/wiki/User:Spatel5040/enes100/Helicopter_2 Another teardown]
It is running linux 2.6.x on armv5 and is accessible via telnet: * [https://www.libcrack.so/2012/10/13/hacking-the-ar-drone-parrot/ Hacking the AR.Drone]
Not to be confused with AR.Drone 2.0, which has a different FCC ID ([https://fcc.io/RKX/MYKONOS3 RKXMYKONOS3]).
